price: (Yewe Musa!) “Genda wowe n’umuvandimwe wawe (Haruna) mwitwaje ibitangaza byanjye, kandi ntimuzadohoke mu kunsingiza.”
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
